description: Fully featured for versatility and focused on mobility, the Snowshot Pants have an H 2 No® Performance Standard 2-layer shell for waterproof/breathable and windproof protection, an articulated fit for freedom of movement and a smooth mesh liner for comfort and easy layering. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia Snowshot Pants, Reg - Mens

specs.value: 3.2-oz 100% polyester plain weave with a DWR finish
